snippet: Under a decade-old decoy operation known as Lucky Bag, New York City police officers place purses, wallets or other valuables out in the open and wait to see who takes them.
abstract: New York City Police Department agrees to oversight and restrictions on decade-old decoy operation known as Lucky Bag; operation is effort to tempt thieves and make arrests, but many say it has trapped innocent passers-by who insist they are picking up found items in hopes of returning them to rightful owners.
lead_paragraph: Under a decade-old decoy operation known as Lucky Bag, New York City police officers place purses, wallets or other valuables out in the open and wait to see who takes them.

headline.main: Police Accept Restrictions on Using Decoy Purses
headline.print_headline: Police Accept Restrictions on Using Decoy Purses
